metadata.name: IFSCA Quarterly Report Validation
metadata.description: Validation rules for quarterly reporting template

A.errorMessage: Institution Name is required and cannot be empty

B.errorMessage: Total Assets must be a positive number

C.errorMessage: Currency Code must be a 3-letter code (e.g., USD, INR)

D.errorMessage: Reporting Date must be in valid date format

globalValidations.name: total_assets_check
globalValidations.description: Total assets must be greater than zero
